help_document.overview: Pricing for chips, reagents and services from the Affymetrix Core

summary.name: Ordering chips and reagents from Affymetrix
summary.description: * These prices are for internal users only. External users must negotiate prices with Affymetrix directly and purchase these items themselves. Please note that labeling kits components each contain the EXACT volume necessary for 30 reactions, so after allowing for pipetting errors it is unlikely you will actually be able to label 30 RNAs from a single labeling kit.

section.name: Catalog #
section.entry: ENTRY YOUR OWN DATA CATALOG NUMBER

section.name: Provide Core Facility With
section.entry: At least 2 ug total RNA, Chips
At least 20 ng total RNA, Chips
1 uL RNA at > 50 ng/uL for a Nano chip, > 200 pg/uL for a Pico chip
